channel.title: Help with shops
channel.description:
i moved around some npcs 2 new locations, but now i want em 2 sell stuff. for example, how do i make a mysterious old man sell items by pressing the "talk" option?
a step by step guide or a link 2 a guide would b very helpful,
ty :)

item.title: Help with shops
item.dc:creator: @justlikers justlikers
item.description:
@justlikers wrote:

first off you have to have a npc in the autospawn.cfg
then you go into shops.cfg and add a new shop. making the shop seller or keeper the same as the one in autospawn
then go into client.java and do some wanneshop thingy…theres a tut somewere

Read full topic
